HEADER <limit.h>
	char  = -128 - 127
	short = -32768 - 32767
	int   = -2147483648 - 2147483647
	long  = -9223372036854775808 - 9223372036854775807

COMPUTE RANGUE: INTEGERS
	char  = -128 - 127
	short = -32768 - 32767
	int   = -2147483648 - 2147483647
	long  = -9223372036854775808 - 9223372036854775807

HEADER <float.h>
	float     = 1.175494e-38 - 3.402823e+38
	double    = 2.225074e-308 - 1.797693e+308
